error.signature: TS2589: Type instantiation is excessively deep and possibly infinite

verdict.summary: Recursive type instantiation exceeds the compiler's depth limit. Simplify the type or add a recursion terminator.

dead_ends.why_fails: The underlying type will be any, and the infinite recursion may slow down the IDE

workarounds.action: Add a recursion depth limit using a counter type
Simplify the type by reducing nesting or using intermediate type aliases

leads_to.condition: When depth limit fix reveals circular references

preceded_by.condition: When recursive conditional types exceed depth

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Same underlying error code; this entry covers the general pattern while ts2589 covers specific instances
